articles.author: Steven Yablonski
articles.title: Cross-country winter storm to blast millions with threats of blizzard conditions, icing across 35 states - Fox Weather
articles.description: A significant and disruptive winter storm will impact millions of Americans from coast-to-coast this week, with heavy snow, blizzard conditions, significant icing, flooding and severe weather all possible.
